text: aur kitaabavaalon mein se kuchh aise bhee hai, jo is haal mein ki unake dil allaah ke aage jhuke hue hote hai, allaah par eemaan rakhate hai aur us cheez par bhee jo tumhaaree or utaaree gaee hai, aur us cheez par bhee jo svayan unakee or utaree. ve allaah kee aayaton ka tuchchh mooly par sauda nahin karate, unake lie unake rab ke paas unaka pratidaan hai. allaah hisaab bhee jald hee kar dega
